column4: ok here one...just killed the process boince ..ok..checked in prorcesses tabl...and its still running wt??
any ideas anyone..just killed a process..and its still running..
did you kill the process with "sudo"?  And if so, have you tried sudo kill -9 <pid>?
sudo lets you run single commands with superuser privileges, just type "sudo" before the command.  For example: sudo kill <pid>
